;----------------------------
; Start of Draggable Switches Support Section
; Added by Swordmaster on 16 Jun 2013
;----------------------------
; orthogonal DTR A1 switch variations
0x53940500,3,0,0x03031500,1,0=0x53940500,3,0,0x53940600,3,0
0x53940500,3,0,0x03031500,3,0=0x53940500,3,0,0x53940600,3,0
0x53940500,1,1,0x03031500,1,0=0x53940500,1,1,0x53940600,1,1
0x53940500,1,1,0x03031500,3,0=0x53940500,1,1,0x53940600,1,1
0x53940200,3,0,0x53940100,1,1=0x53940c00,3,0,0x53940100,1,1
0x53940200,1,1,0x53940100,3,0=0x53940c00,1,1,0x53940100,3,0
; orthogonal DTR A2 switch main
0x53948100,1,0,0x03031500,1,0=0x53948100,1,0,0x53948000,1,0
0x53948100,1,0,0x03031500,3,0=0x53948100,1,0,0x53948000,1,0
0x53948100,3,1,0x03031500,1,0=0x53948100,3,1,0x53948000,3,1
0x53948100,3,1,0x03031500,3,0=0x53948100,3,1,0x53948000,3,1
; orthogonal DTR A2 switch variations
0x53948000,1,0,0x53948100,1,1=0x53948800,1,0,0x53948100,1,1
0x53948000,3,1,0x53948100,3,0=0x53948800,3,1,0x53948100,3,0
0x53948000,1,0,0x53948100,3,0=0x53948900,1,0,0x53948100,3,0
0x53948000,3,1,0x53948100,1,1=0x53948900,1,1,0x53948100,1,1
0x53948300,3,0,0x53948100,1,1=0x53948a00,3,0,0x53948100,1,1
0x53948300,1,1,0x53948100,3,0=0x53948a00,1,1,0x53948100,3,0
0x53948300,3,0,0x53940100,1,1=0x53948d00,3,0,0x53940100,1,1
0x53948300,1,1,0x53940100,3,0=0x53948d00,1,1,0x53940100,3,0
; orthogonal DTR B2 switch
; orthogonal DTR C2 switch
0x03031500,1,0,0x5394a100,3,0=0x5394a000,3,0,0x5394a100,3,0
0x03031500,3,0,0x5394a100,3,0=0x5394a000,3,0,0x5394a100,3,0
0x03031500,1,0,0x5394a100,1,1=0x5394a000,1,1,0x5394a100,1,1
0x03031500,3,0,0x5394a100,1,1=0x5394a000,1,1,0x5394a100,1,1
; STR continuation from X1 switches
0x53940600,3,0,0x03031500,1,0=0x53940600,3,0,0x5d300000,1,0
0x53940600,3,0,0x03031500,3,0=0x53940600,3,0,0x5d300000,3,0
0x53940600,1,1,0x03031500,1,0=0x53940600,1,1,0x5d300000,1,0
0x53940600,1,1,0x03031500,3,0=0x53940600,1,1,0x5d300000,3,0
